title: Popular Detective
aka: Proposal Perilous (only for a misfiled contribution renewal; see record details)

renewed-contributions.title: Proposal Perilous
renewed-contributions.note: This is misfiled in the 1976 July-December CCE in Periodicals, listed as a renewal for a magazine titled 'Proposal Perilous', instead of as a renewal for a story by that name that appeared in Popular Detective with the indicated issue date and number.
